title: What is a child education insurance plan? - Quora

response.answer_text: Child insurance plan is basically for the higher education of the child. None of us is aware of the future. The upbringing of the child requires excellent financial planning and the sooner one begins it, the better it would be. It is the best financial plan, investment plan and the most suitable policy for your child as it ensures continued education and a secure future. It is always preferred to plan accordingly. It is a good option to work upon with guidance. There are different banks and insurance companies with the great advisors on the chair at your service. I believe it is really important to be aware of the policies and plans before choosing the most appropriate one. Child insurance plans in India are very vast and have multiple benefits. And with the years passing by, these are growing as well for the better. These child insurance plans in India need to be fast and convenient, economical for all sections of the society, should require a minimum paperwork and transparent means all the charges must be shown upfront with no hidden costs. Henceforth, it is suggested to have a child education insurance plan for your child’s secure future.

As a parent I understand your worries; the ever increasing cost of education requires us to invest towards our kid’s education from the very beginning, or else they will either have to sacrifice their dreams or strive to conquer them under the burden of heavy student loans. I have covered my daughter’s education under Aegon Life’s Rising Star Insurance Plan and I feel very confident that it will serve its purpose well, when time comes. If you wish to secure your child’s education, all you need to do is follow these four simple steps— Step 1: Calculate the sum assured according to the inflating rates of education and determine your premium paying capacity; choose your premium value in alignment with the same. Step 2: Fill the application form. Feel free to take help from the company’s Life Advisor. Their guidance will help you a great deal in getting a clear understanding about the whole process. Step 3: A cheque will have to be drawn in the favour of Aegon Life Insurance Co. Ltd. in order to pay for the policy. Step 4: Once you have applied for the policy, wait for a verification call from the Aegon Life call centre. That’s all what I did to get my policy. You can read about the plan at https://www.aegonlife.com/insurance-plans/child-plans/rising-star-insurance.
